H0.text: Amount of lightning is a factor that most likely would affect the climate in a particular area.

H1.text: Distance from an ocean is a factor that most likely would affect the climate in a particular area.

H2.text: Number of earthquakes is a factor that most likely would affect the climate in a particular area.

H3.text: Shape of the shoreline is a factor that most likely would affect the climate in a particular area.

A4.text: Oceanic climates are a product and reflection of the cool ocean adjacent to them.
